def min_dot(a, b):
    return sum(x * y for (x, y) in zip(sorted(a), sorted(b, reverse = True)))

def min_dot(a, b):
    return sum(map(int.__mul__, sorted(a), sorted(b)[::-1]))

def min_dot(a, b):
    return sum((ai * bi) for ai, bi in zip(sorted(a), sorted(b, reverse=True)))

def min_dot(a, b):
    return sum(i * j for i , j in zip(sorted(a), sorted(b)[::-1]))

import numpy as np
min_dot=lambda a,b: np.dot(sorted(a), sorted(b, reverse = True))
